arabic_text: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلرِّجۡزَ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ هُم بَٰلِغُوهُ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ
translation: (135) But when We removed the punishment from them until a term which they were to reach,[398] then at once they broke their word.
footnotes: [398]- i.e., a specified term which would end with their reversion to disobedience and disbelief.
